title: Ryan urges 'more surgical approach' than Trump's tariff plan
text:
Ryan urges 'more surgical approach' than Trump's tariff plan 5:34pm GMT - 00:57 
House Speaker Paul Ryan told reporters on Tuesday that while that dumping of steel and aluminum was clearly ''abuse'', President Trump's proposed solution of imposing steep tariffs is ''a little too broad'' and that a ''more surgical'' approach is needed. Rough cut   
House Speaker Paul Ryan told reporters on Tuesday that while that dumping of steel and aluminum was clearly "abuse", President Trump's proposed solution of imposing steep tariffs is "a little too broad" and that a "more surgical" approach is needed. Rough cut  //reut.rs/2I8Hd0E
